content: प्रजा (Changed to प्रजस् at the end of a <ab>Bah.</ab> compound, when the first member is अ, सु or दुस्; see <ls>R. 8. 32</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 29.</ls>) {@--1@} Procreation, generation, propagation, birth, production. {@--2@} Offspring, progeny, issue; children, brood (of animals); प्रजार्थव्रतकर्शितांगं <ls>R. 2. 73</ls>; प्रजायै गृहमेधिनां <ls>R. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 42</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 269</ls>; so बकस्य प्रजा, सर्पप्रजा &c. {@--3@} Posterity, descendants. {@--4@} A creature. {@--5@} Subjects, people, mankind; ननंदुः सप्रजाः प्रजाः <ls>R. 4. 3</ls>; प्रजाः प्रजाः स्वा इव तंत्रीयत्वा <ls>Ś. 5. 5</ls> (where प्रजा has sense 2 also); <ls>R. 1. 7</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 73</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 8.</ls> {@--6@} Semen.
